resources.string:
SONG PREVIEW: 
Pinch with two fingers to change font size scale. 
 
TRANSPOSING: 
You can transpose any song with chords to any key. Click transposing icon on top of song preview to show transposing panel. 
-5, -1, +1, +5 buttons - tranposition by number of semitones. 
0 button - restore original key. 
 
AUTOSCROLL: 
Click autoscroll icon on top of song preview screen to show autoscroll panel. Starting autoscroll causes the lyrics to be scrolled automatically by some timer. If lyrics are at the beginning, autoscrolling will be started with some delay (counting down before scrolling). If you scroll down manually while this countdown, the scroll will be started immediately. You can adjust scrolling speed or initial delay of autoscroll in settings or in autoscroll panel. Scrolling up or down manually while autoscrolling enabled causes autoscroll speed to be auto-adjusted (speed up or slow down).

Guitar SongBook v%s 
Songs database version: %s 

AUTHOR: 
igrek51 - Ireneusz Szulc 

TECHNOLOGIES USED:

AssertJ 
Dagger 2

Guava

Joda Time 
jUnit 
Kotlin 
Material Design icons 
Mockito 
Roboelectric 
RxAndroid 
RxJava
You can contact me if you have noticed some bugs or you have any ideas how to improve this application. I would be very grateful for your comments.
End of file - Autoscroll has been stopped.
